competitors.name: Amazon Redshift
competitors.notes: AWS cloud data warehouse with cluster-based architecture

competitors.name: Google BigQuery
competitors.notes: Serverless data warehouse with storage-compute separation

competitors.name: Azure Synapse Analytics
competitors.notes: Microsoft's evolved data warehouse (formerly SQL DW)

competitors.name: Databricks
competitors.notes: Data lakehouse platform combining warehouse performance with data lake flexibility

competitors.name: Cloudera Data Platform
competitors.notes: Comprehensive data management platform supporting hybrid and multi-cloud

competitors.name: IBM Db2
competitors.notes: Enterprise data warehouse with MPP and BLU technology

competitors.name: Teradata
competitors.notes: Enterprise data warehouse solution transitioning to cloud

context: 2020 was a pivotal year for Snowflake as it went public in September with a record-breaking IPO. The competitive landscape solidified around major cloud platforms and the emerging lakehouse architecture led by Databricks.
